CustomField.formula: Text(PAYMENTMETHOD__c) & ' ' & CASE(PAYMENTMETHOD__c, 0, 'Cash', 1, 'Coupon', 2, 'Auto transfer', 3, 'Payroll', 4, 'Payroll after due', 5, 'Distribution', 6, 'Distribution after due', 7, 'Scheduled auto transfer', 8, 'Scheduled auto transfer after due', 9, 'Amortization transfer', '')
CustomField.label: Payment Method
